name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ZealNotes: Add and Manage Notes on Websites

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make and read notes for various Websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browsing through Websites. Want to make some Note? Open ZealNotes and add as many notes you want. Notes will be stored safefy for every domain. 
Next time you visit that domain. You will have the note right beside it.
View all your notes organized and categorized at one place
